This is where I don't mind NTR. She did everything to please her boyfriend. It's somewhat of a bitterswweet but yet really wholesome story.

NTR is one of my fetishes, but this one in particular scared the crap out of me. I love the story, it has a good premise, the sequel was too much for me. I got a boner, but at the same time I can't fap. This story was so good, it made me think twice about doing a cuckold play with my girlfriend.

To avoid NTR, bookmark:

"nhentai(dot)net/search/?q=-netorare"

You can add any other reprehensible shit you hate to the string at the end, using "+-". For example:

"nhentai(dot)net/search/?q=-netorare+-guro+-snuff+-scat+-yaoi+-amputation"

Or, for the same thing, but only English results:

"nhentai(dot)net/search/?q=english+-netorare+-guro+-snuff+-scat+-yaoi+-amputation"

That way, when you visit the site you'll automatically bypass the nasty shit, and you won't even have to log in.

Some of you lame fucks probably already know this, and are bitching about NTR even though you know how to avoid it. Fuck you. To everyone else, I hope this helped!
